reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater set stylish and versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down and works well for both office wear and travel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars really nice set for the money. It’s become a “go to” in my closet.
items.body: I love this set. I am 5‘4“ and I ordered a medium. It fits perfectly. I love to wear it for travel, or when I want to be comfortable, but still look put together. The fabric is thicker than I expected, in a good way. I may order another set! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Super comfy! Fabric is good quality, warm and stretchy, not thin or see-through and easy to dress up or down. Read more
items.author: E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!!!
items.body: Love this outfit and everything I have bought from this company. Very good quality and color for the price. Skirt is very fitted. Read more
items.author: Vixen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and nice quality
items.body: This set is cute and the sweater can even be worn alone. As far as washability , I will wash on cold and not put it in the dryer to start, but I haven’t washed it yet. Washability is important to me though and not holding up between washes would potentially cost this review a star. It seems like really nice quality for the value. I could wear this to a soccer game or out to lunch and seems very versatile when worn with some white sneakers. I couldn’t decide on the color since a few colors are super cute, but chose gray. The set is stretchy and warm for certain seasons, but not suitable for cold weather. The flow of the outfit from top to bottom is has nice lines. Read more
items.author: melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY RECOMMEND - fabulous set!
items.body: I ordered this and thought I’d wear the set (which I will) but I love the top. I wear with distressed black jeans and it’s perfect! I was surprised when it arrived. It was such a thick, soft, great quality I couldn’t believe it. Half the time you never know what you are going to get. I HIGHLY recommend this one. And the skirt is super cute too just haven’t worn it yet. Read more
items.author: Bernny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars When I wear PG I get compliments!
items.body: The PG 2 piece skirt set is really so cute. Fits true to size and I can wear it with heels or tennis shoes. The fabric is nice and holds up to washing. Read more
items.author: Steven Strecker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute quality outfit!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Love this outfit! I have purchased a lot of different items and this is definitely one of the higher quality ones. I’m exactly 5’5”, 145 pounds and purchased the medium. I have long arms, broad shoulders and a larger bust, with a little belly pooch. The skirt hits my lower calf but I do have the skirt higher so the band hits my belly to hide it. I have long arms but I like that it hits my wrist. Material is good quality and heavier than I thought it would be (more of a early spring/fall/winter than hot summer day outfit) but it may not hold its shape and could stretch out if you tug on it a lot. It’s pretty soft and not scratchy (I am sensitive to a lot of sweater materials)! I bought the white with black stripes. I don’t think it’s super see through but you may have to wear a tank underneath it or spanx for the skirt to get more of an hour glass shape. You could wear each separately…the top could go with a lot! Skirt could be paired with knee high boots, flats or sneakers. My only concern is stretching it out over time and how it washes (update later). It does come with an extra button +! Hopefully this was helpful as I read and look at a lot of reviews before I buy and some don’t provide all the info or photos I would want to make a decision. Read more
items.author: Katie P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Find!
items.body: This is such a beautiful set. Great pieces to mix and match when traveling. Nice quality. Will buy other colors. Very comfy. Dress up or down. Read more
items.author: MaryinTexas

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red White Stripe, Apricot Stripe, White Stripe, Dark Blue Stripe, Pink Stripe, Royal Blue White Stripe, Light Grey Stripe, Khaki Stripe, Rose Red Stripe, Beige Black Stripe, Black Stripe, Brick Red Stripe, Caramel Stripe, Grey White Stripe. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
